reviewText: Subtitles for this DVD are absolutely terrible.  There are times where I was certain that some of the dialogue wasn't even being translated.  Considering how renowned and critically acclaimed this film is (Martin Scorsese called it his favorite film of the 90's), it would be better to wait for a higher-quality release of this film.
A breathtaking spectacle. A must see for all students and admirers of modern Chinese cinema. Thanks again Amazon. I love it.
It is an amazing movie, but the quality of DVD is horrible! Way below any acceptable level.  It is painful to watch.
